hanzi-su-wiki:
岐

Значения

Разветвляться, отделяться

Мнемоника

Разветвление 支 горной 山 дороги.
purpleculture_pinyin:
qí
surname Qi; also used in place names; variant of 歧 [qi2]
фамилия Ци; также используется в названиях мест; вариант 歧 [qi2]
rtega_mnemonic:
岐岐RShigh, majestic, fork in road
  • branching 支 road in the majestic mountain 山
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 支 indicates the sound; 山 (mountain) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
岐山 [ qí shān ]: Qishan County in Baoji 宝鸡 , Shaanxi
岐山县 [ qí shān xiàn ]: Qishan County in Baoji 宝鸡 , Shaanxi
岐阜县 [ qí fù xiàn ]: Gifu prefecture, Japan
王岐山 [ wáng qí shān ]: Wang Qishan (1948-), PRC politician
八岐大蛇 [ bā qí dà shé ]: Yamata no Orochi, serpent with eight heads and eight tails from mythological section of Nihon Shoki (Chronicles of Japan)
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 山 [ shān ] mountain, hill, peak
    • 支 [ zhī ] to support, to sustain; to withdraw, to pay; a branch (of a bank)
heisig_constituent: branch off, mountain, branch, ten, needle, crotch
Keyword_KANJIDIC: branch off, fork in road, scene, arena, theater
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: ответвляются, развилки дорог, сцена, арена, театр
koohiiStory1: On the left, there are three mountains. The road branches off to each of them. (Note: This kanji is mostly used for branches in the road).
koohiiStory2: In a lot of Super Nintendo-era RPGs, there are mountain levels to get through. You view them from overhead, so you can see a mazelike path with many branches. Picture your sprite characters at one such fork in the mountain path, as it branches off in two directions.
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: A mountain branch will branch off from the rest.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Picture this part of the mountain, branching off from the rest, into a mysterious path of its own.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: If you want to branch off from your hiking group and explore this branch of the mountain, you need a special key (き). Just don't get caught down there or you'll get the guillotine (ぎ).
WaniKani_Reading_Info: If you branch off from the beaten path, you need 1) access, and 2) to be really careful so you keep your head.
Ru_Meaning: branch off, fork in road, scene, arena, theater

  • разветвление, множество направлений

岐字的基本解释

岐
qí
〔岐山〕山名，在中国陕西省。
〔岐黄之术〕指中医的医术。“岐”，岐伯；“
同“歧”。黄”，黄帝，相传他们都是中华民族医家之祖。

岐字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qí］
［《廣韻》巨支切，平支，羣。］
(1)山名。详“岐山”。
(2)即岐伯。参见“岐黄”、“岐伯”。
(3)水名。在今陕西省麟游县境。
(4)同“歧”。分支；分岔。
(5)同“歧”。分开；岔出。
(6)同“歧”。分歧，不一致。
(7)高低不平。见“岐峻”、“岐嶇”。
(8)旧称海南岛一少数民族。
(9)泛指少数民族。参见“岐婆”。
(10)见“岐岐”。
(11)见“岐嶷”。
(12)姓。晋代有岐盛。见《晋书·楚王玮传》。

岐字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【山字部】　岐； 康熙笔画：7； 页码：页308第24
〔古文〕?㟚【廣韻】巨支切【集韻】【韻會】翹移切【正韻】渠宜切，?音跂。【說文】山名。后稷十三世孫古公亶父始居此。【詩·大雅】率西水滸，至于岐下。【一統志】山有兩岐，故名。【六書故】一在今鳳翔府岐山縣，禹貢導岍及岐，是也。又山海經，岐山，狐岐之山，在今汾州介休縣，勝水出焉，東北會於汾，禹貢治梁及岐，是也。　又州名。本雍州地，後爲秦都，漢爲扶風郡，元魏置岐州，唐改鳳翔府，號西京。　又路岐也。【釋名】物兩爲岐，在邊爲旁。【爾雅·釋宮】二達謂之岐旁。【註】道旁出也。【列子·說符篇】亡羊者曰：岐之中又有岐，不知所之，所以返也。　又峻也。【詩·大雅】克岐克嶷。【朱傳】岐嶷，峻茂之貌。　又姓。【正字通】黃帝臣岐伯，唐岐靈岳。◎按《集韻》翹移切，音祁。周文王所封地。又常支切，音坻。山名。又渠羈切，音奇。地名。又章移切，音支。分也。與諸家音切相齟齬。今不从。　【集韻】本作?。【韻會】或作歧。

岐字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
岐字的起名意思

：一般指不相同，不一致；也指岐岐，形容聪颖早慧，如岐山鸣凤，指谓吉祥之兆。

Qi
Basic explanation of words
Qi
qí
[Qishan] The name of the mountain is in Shaanxi Province, China.
[Qihuangzhishu] refers to the medical skills of Chinese medicine. "Qi", Uncle Qi;"
Same as "differentiation". Huang", Huangdi, according to legend, they are the ancestors of the Chinese medical school.
Qi
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qí］
["Guangyun" huge branch cut, flat branch, group. ]
(1) The name of the mountain. Details "Qishan".
(2) Namely Qi Bo. See "Qi Huang", "Qi Bo".
(3) Water name. In today's Linyou County, Shaanxi Province.
(4) Same as "discrimination". Branch; bifurcation.
(5) Same as "discrimination". Separate;
(6) Same as "differentiation". Disagreement, inconsistency.
(7) Roughness. See "Qi Jun" and "Qi Jiu".
(8) Formerly known as a minority in Hainan Island.
(9) Refers to ethnic minorities in general. See "Qi Po".
(10) See "Qiqi".
(11) See "Qiyi".
(12) Last name. There was Qisheng in the Jin Dynasty. See "Book of Jin · Chu Wangwei Biography".

Qi
Name meaning
: Generally refers to different and inconsistent; also refers to Qiqi, describing intelligent and early wisdom, such as Qishan Mingfeng, referring to auspicious signs.
qí
I сущ.
вм. 歧 (разветвление)
II собств.
1) геогр. (сокр. вм. 岐山) Цишань (гора и уезд в пров. Шэньси)
2) Ци (фамилия)
Radicals: 山, 支  (mountain, branch)
Meaning Mnemonic
A mountain branch will branch off from the rest.
Picture this part of the mountain, branching off from the rest, into a mysterious path of its own.
Reading Mnemonic
If you want to branch off from your hiking group and explore this branch of the mountain, you need a special key (き). Just don't get caught down there or you'll get the guillotine (ぎ).
If you branch off from the beaten path, you need 1) access, and 2) to be really careful so you keep your head.
